rows: Current lifecycle status of the product. On the product page, the status is displayed as a progress bar. Only products in "Current" status are available for selection.
Target customer segment. For example, "Contact" (retail), "Legal entity" (B2B).
Subtype filtered by the selected type. Optional. For example, "Personal CDs", "Business CDs".
Employee responsible for the product. Populated automatically using the record creator, but can be changed.
Date when the product becomes active. Required when status is "Current" or "Outdated".
Date of product deactivation. Required when status is "Outdated".
Hides the product from offers and selection flows. Use when the product is withdrawn from sale or shipment.
html:
Field name

Field value

Status

Current lifecycle status of the product. On the product page, the status is displayed as a progress bar. Only products in "Current" status are available for selection.

Available for

Target customer segment. For example, "Contact" (retail), "Legal entity" (B2B).

Subtype

Subtype filtered by the selected type. Optional. For example, "Personal CDs", "Business CDs".

Owner

Employee responsible for the product. Populated automatically using the record creator, but can be changed.

Start date

Date when the product becomes active. Required when status is "Current" or "Outdated".

End date

Date of product deactivation. Required when status is "Outdated".

Inactive

Hides the product from offers and selection flows. Use when the product is withdrawn from sale or shipment.
